Table.name: SMDNP
Table.sql: SELECT (SELECT ISNULL(LTRUCK_NO,'')+';' FROM SMRV WHERE SMRV.BAT_NO=A.BAT_NO FOR XML PATH('')) AS LTRUCK_NO, (SELECT ISNULL(LDRIVER,'')+';' FROM SMRV WHERE SMRV.BAT_NO=A.BAT_NO FOR XML PATH('')) AS LDRIVER, B.PKG_UNIT AS PKG_UNIT_UB,B.PKG_NUM,B.PKG_UNIT,B.PKG_UNIT_DESC, C.TRAN_TYPE,POD AS POD_CD,POD_NM AS POD_NM,C.SHIPMENT_ID,C.DN_NO,C.PORT_POL,C.PORT_POLNM,D.*,A.TRUCKER,A.TRUCKER_NM,A.CNTR_NO,A.SEAL_NO1 , C.CUSTOMER_INNUMBER,(SELECT TOP 1 CASE WHEN PARTY_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN PARTY_NAME + ' ' ELSE '' END +CASE WHEN (PARTY_NAME2 IS NOT NULL) THEN PARTY_NAME2 + ' ' ELSE '' END +CASE WHEN (PARTY_NAME3 IS NOT NULL) THEN PARTY_NAME3 + ' ' ELSE '' END +CASE WHEN (PARTY_NAME4 IS NOT NULL) THEN PARTY_NAME4 + ' ' ELSE '' END FROM SMPTY WHERE SMPTY.STATUS='U' AND SMPTY.PARTY_NO = (SELECT TOP 1 C.PLANT FROM SMDN WHERE C.PLANT IS NOT NULL AND B.SHIPMENT_ID = SMDN.SHIPMENT_ID)) AS P_NAME, A.QTY V_QTY,A.QTYU V_QTYU , C.GW I_TTL_GW FROM SMRV A LEFT JOIN SMSM B ON A.SHIPMENT_ID = B.SHIPMENT_ID LEFT JOIN SMDN C ON A.DN_NO LIKE '%'+C.DN_NO+'%' LEFT JOIN SMDNP D ON C.U_ID = D.U_FID AND C.DN_NO=D.DN_NO WHERE A.BAT_NO = ':=batno'

Table.name: PARTY
Table.sql: SELECT * FROM SMDNPT A LEFT JOIN SMPTY ON A.PARTY_NO = SMPTY.PARTY_NO AND SMPTY.STATUS='U' WHERE A.DN_NO =':=val'
